title: Elvis Vermeulen
text: Elvis Vermeulen is a former <a href="France">French</a> <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> footballer. He played for <a href="ASM%20Clermont%20Auvergne">ASM Clermont Auvergne</a> and <a href="CA%20Brive">CA Brive</a> in the top level of French rugby, the <a href="Top%2014">Top 14</a> competition. He has also played for the <a href="France%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">French national team</a>, earning his first cap on 16 June 2001 against <a href="South%20Africa%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">South Africa</a>. He scored the championship winning try of the <a href="2007%20Six%20Nations">2007 Six Nations</a> against <a href="Scotland%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Scotland</a>. This try meant France won the championship on points difference ahead of <a href="Ireland%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Ireland</a>.
